title: [Feat]: Some way to open a meeting with only id/key
body:
### Describe the feature

Ability to open a meeting using only id and key

### Motivation

Currently Teams help at MS try to say that open calendar in teams and open from there. I just had a public conference meeting that was copy&pasted into calendar, so teams did not recognize the link. Link opens browser. Could not find anywhere to use ID/key and MS web-page for id/key again just opens the browser.

This might not be a problem with teams-for-linux as such, but looking for a work around. Perhaps teams-for linux could have a menu-item where one could enter id/key, perhaps also a meeting url since recent MS shenanigans.
Personally I rather not use Teams at all, unfortunately it is not something I can do at work.

### Alternatives

_No response_

### Additional context

_No response_
